name: Daily AI Wallpaper
author: Masong19hippows
description:
Periodically Change Your Wallpaper With AI Generated Art 

 This webscrapes data from Nigthcafe and displays them as your wallpaper (after some editing). If you want a detailed look at how each option affects the final image, look at https://creator.nightcafe.studio/explore and play around with settings.

 The icons for this extension were provided by icons8 at https://icons8.com/icons/set/robot-art
